Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model

Class Group

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.Group
public class Group extends Object
Simple model class for representing a Group with a name and the ID of the owner.

      public void setOwnerID(int newOwnerID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets a new owner ID for the group. The new ID must be positive, >0.
      Parameters:
      newOwnerID - The new ID for the owner.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the ID parameter is negative or 0.
